column2:
"Excellent. I see you're one of the good ones.
My fears were completely unfounded, then."

"You need an element synthesizer each time
you make an element upgrade, but it's worth
the boost to the element value you'll get."

"Of course, there are limits to element values.
With the current technology, it maxes out at
50, so that's what I want you to shoot for."

"Heh. This reminds me of this one time, in
the old days, when I somehow managed to
get an element synthesizer jammed in my…"

"うむ、よろしい！
やはり君は優秀なアークスだな。
杞憂で済んでよかった。"

"アイテムは属性強化する毎に
シンセサイザーが必要になるが
やればやるだけ属性値も向上する！"

"もちろん、属性値の最大はある。
現在の技術では５０が限界だ。
つまり、そこまでは鍛えられるのだ！"
"いいか、私の得意な属性も武器に……"
